name.en: The Third Planning of Nanjing Metro

desc.zh-Hans: 线路图包含南京三期规划的全部建设成果，其中18号线为特别展示，并不在三期规划内。
desc.en: The route map includes all the construction achievements of Nanjing Phase III Plan, with Line 18 being a special display and not included in the Phase III Plan.

updateHistory.reason: New template of the third phase planning of Nanjing metro based on the authoritative circuit diagram.
